CirnoMod.Card.Chillness.NAME: Chillness
CirnoMod.Card.Chillness.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Apply !M! Frozen to ALL enemies.

CirnoMod.Card.AvoidDanger.NAME: Avoid Danger
CirnoMod.Card.AvoidDanger.DESCRIPTION: If the enemy intends to attack, gain !B! Block; NL otherwise gain !M! Flight.
